name: Koala Pit Trap
text: Send this card to the GY if you do not control a "Koala" monster. If a monster is Summoned to your opponent's field: Banish that card until the End Phase. If your opponent activates a Spell Card: Pay 500 LP; Negate the effect of that card, banish it, and return it to your opponent's hand during the End Phase. If your opponent activates a Trap card: Negate the effect of that card, banish it, and set it back to their field during your Draw Phase. You can only use one effect of "Koala Pit Trap" per turn.
